# Why and How we integrated DuckDB & MotherDuck with GoodData

2024/06/07

Learn from Jan Soubusta how GoodData integrated DuckDB & MotherDuck within their product! Many thanks to them for hosting this meetup in Prague on May 29th 2024.

Postgres analytics 10x faster?! ðŸ¤¯

pg\_duckdb is here! This open-source extension adds DuckDB's analytics to Postgres, supporting Parquet, CSV, Iceberg reads, and direct MotherDuck queriesâ€”all within Postgres!

### [DuckDB & Iceberg : The Future of Lightweight Data Management](https://motherduck.com/videos/duckdb-iceberg-the-future-of-lightweight-data-management)

Join Brian Olsen from Tabular and Mehdi for a quack and code session exploring the world of table formats, with a special focus on Iceberg and DuckDB. They dive into the latest advancements and give a hands-on demonstration.
